Translations.Text: Fakhalafa Min Ba`dihim Khalfun 'Ađa`u As-Salaata Wa Attaba`u Ash-Shahawati Fasawfa Yalqawna Ghayyaan
Illa Man Taba Wa 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Fa'ula'ika Yadkhuluna Al-Jannata Wa La Yuzlamuna Shay'aan
Jannati `Adnin Allati Wa`ada Ar-Rahmanu `Ibadahu Bil-Ghaybi 'Innahu Kana Wa`duhu Ma'tiyaan
La Yasma`una Fiha Laghwan 'Illa Salamaan Wa Lahum Rizquhum Fiha Bukratan Wa `Ashiyaan
Tilka Al-Jannatu Allati Nurithu Min `Ibadina Man Kana Taqiyaan
Wa Ma Natanazzalu 'Illa Bi'amri Rabbika Lahu Ma Bayna 'Aydina Wa Ma Khalfana Wa Ma Bayna Dhalika Wa Ma Kana Rabbuka Nasiyaan
Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Fa`bud/hu Wa Astabir Li`ibadatihi Hal Ta`lamu Lahu Samiyaan
Wa Yaqulu Al-'Insanu 'A'idha Ma Mittu Lasawfa 'Ukhraju Hayyaan
Awala Yadhkuru Al-'Insanu 'Anna Khalaqnahu Min Qablu Wa Lam Yaku Shay'aan
Fawarabbika Lanahshurannahum Wa Ash-Shayatina Thumma Lanuhđirannahum Hawla Jahannama Jithiyaan
Thumma Lananzi`anna Min Kulli Shi`atin 'Ayyuhum 'Ashaddu `Ala Ar-Rahmani `Itiyaan
Thumma Lanahnu 'A`lamu Bial-Ladhina Hum 'Awla Biha Siliyaan
Wa 'In Minkum 'Illa Wa Ariduha Kana `Ala Rabbika Hatmaan Maqđiyaan
Thumma Nunajji Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Wa Nadharu Az-Zalimina Fiha Jithiyaan
Wa 'Idha Tutla `Alayhim 'Ayatuna Bayyinatin Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru Lilladhina 'Amanu 'Ayyu Al-Fariqayni Khayrun Maqamaan Wa 'Ahsanu Nadiyaan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Min Qarnin Hum 'Ahsanu 'Athathaan Wa Ri'yaan
Qul Man Kana Fi Ađ-Đalalati Falyamdud Lahu Ar-Rahmanu Maddaan Hatta 'Idha Ra'aw Ma Yu`aduna 'Imma Al-`Adhaba Wa 'Imma As-Sa`ata Fasaya`lamuna Man Huwa Sharrun Makanaan Wa 'Ađ`afu Jundaan
Wa Yazidu Allahu Al-Ladhina Ahtadaw Hudaan Wa Al-Baqiyatu As-Salihatu Khayrun `Inda Rabbika Thawabaan Wa Khayrun Maraddaan
Afara'ayta Al-Ladhi Kafara Bi'ayatina Wa Qala La'utayanna Malaan Wa Waladaan
Attala`a Al-Ghayba 'Am Attakhadha `Inda Ar-Rahmani `Ahdaan
Kalla Sanaktubu Ma Yaqulu Wa Namuddu Lahu Mina Al-`Adhabi Maddaan
Wa Narithuhu Ma Yaqulu Wa Ya'tina Fardaan
Wa Attakhadhu Min Duni Allahi 'Alihatan Liyakunu Lahum `Izzaan
Kalla Sayakfuruna Bi`ibadatihim Wa Yakununa `Alayhim Điddaan
Alam Tara 'Anna 'Arsalna Ash-Shayatina `Ala Al-Kafirina Ta'uuzzuhum 'Azzaan
Fala Ta`jal `Alayhim 'Innama Na`uddu Lahum `Addaan
Yawma Nahshuru Al-Muttaqina 'Ila Ar-Rahmani Wafdaan
Wa Nasuqu Al-Mujrimina 'Ila Jahannama Wirdaan
La Yamlikuna Ash-Shafa`ata 'Illa Mani Attakhadha `Inda Ar-Rahmani `Ahdaan
Wa Qalu Attakhadha Ar-Rahmanu Waladaan
Laqad Ji'tum Shay'aan 'Iddaan
Takadu As-Samawatu Yatafattarna Minhu Wa Tanshaqqu Al-'Arđu Wa Takhirru Al-Jibalu Haddaan
An Da`aw Lilrrahmani Waladaan
Wa Ma Yanbaghi Lilrrahmani 'An Yattakhidha Waladaan
In Kullu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi 'Illa 'Ati Ar-Rahmani `Abdaan
Laqad 'Ahsahum Wa `Addahum `Addaan
Wa Kulluhum 'Atihi Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fardaan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Sayaj`alu Lahumu Ar-Rahmanu Wuddaan
Fa'innama Yassarnahu Bilisanika Litubashira Bihi Al-Muttaqina Wa Tundhira Bihi Qawmaan Luddaan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Min Qarnin Hal Tuhissu Minhum Min 'Ahadin 'Aw Tasma`u Lahum Rikzaan
